What is Project Planning?
choices: has to plan who will work on the project, how the project will be broken down into increments, how resources will be allocated across your company, etc.
involves breaking down the work into parts and assign these to project team members, anticipate problems that might arise and prepare tentative solutions to those problems.
when you modify your plan in the light of experience gained and information from monitoring the progress of the work.
answer: involves breaking down the work into parts and assign these to project team members, anticipate problems that might arise and prepare tentative solutions to those problems.

question: It looks ahead for several months and decides on the features that should be included in a release of a system.

ATPROD is the productivity of engineers in integrating this code.

What is Web Services?
choices: Standard protocols have been developed to support service communication and information exchange
an instance of a more general notion of a service
may execute on different computers from different service providers
answer: an instance of a more general notion of a service

question: In this initial stage of service design, you use the requirements for the composite service as a basis for creating an ‘ideal’ service design.

answer: This standard allows a service interface and its bindings to be defined
